scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c green,blue "PORT=3020 pnpm -C citegenerator-api dev" "pnpm -C citegenerator-web dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C citegenerator-api build && pnpm -C citegenerator-web build
scripts.lint: pnpm -C citegenerator-api lint && pnpm -C citegenerator-web lint
scripts.test: pnpm -C citegenerator-api test && pnpm -C citegenerator-web test
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C citegenerator-api typecheck && pnpm -C citegenerator-web typecheck
